text: "Halo of Flies" is a 1973 song by Alice Cooper and was taken from his fourth studio album Killer. It went to number 5 in the Netherlands and number 15 in Belgium. == Track listing == # "Halo of Flies" (Alice Cooper, Glen Buxton, Michael Bruce, Dennis Dunaway, Neal Smith) \- 8:21 # "Under My Wheels" (Michael Bruce, Dennis Dunaway, Bob Ezrin) \- 2:51 ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Alice Cooper songs
title: Halo of Flies (song)
